dct_description_sm: Sbordoni & C. Editori delle Piante e Carte Geografiche, RÃ©clame e Indirizzi del Regno Via Ancona, 6 - Milano ; Pubblicazione dell'Editore Antonio Vallardi, Milano, Via Moscova, 40.
Illustrations of provincial coats of arms near title cartouche.
Shows roads, railroads, regional names, cities and towns, provincial boundaries, city plans (for larger cities), waterways.
Several advertisements (including one for map publisher) with text and illustrations in margins.
